messages.title: Real Change for Britain
messages.content: Nick Clegg's Liberal Democrats are fighting for real change for Britain. Labour have let us down and the Conservatives will not deliver the real change Britain needs.

messages.title: Local and National Issues
messages.content: What would you like to change about our local area?

messages.title: Sandra Gidley’s Residents’ Survey
messages.content: Taking opinions on local issues such as health services, crime, and transport.

messages.title: About You
messages.content: Engaging residents to update records and receive news of Sandra Gidley's work via email.

messages.title: Fighting Crime
messages.content: I'm fighting to put more police on the beat, protect local health services and cut taxes for ordinary local people.

messages.title: It's Sandra Gidley or the Conservatives here
messages.content: Voting Labour will mean a Conservatie MP for Romsey and Southampton North.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect and improve local health services.
More police on the streets to make areas safe.
Cut taxes for ordinary local people.
Address problems with local travel and transport services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Sandra Gidley or the Conservatives here; Voting Labour will mean a Conservative MP for Romsey and Southampton North.

issues.health: Protect and improve local health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have worked hard for our area for 10 years. I want to know your priorities so I can continue standing up for you on issues that matter.

contactInformation.address: Sandra Gidley’s Residents' Survey, FREEPOST, 3A Victoria Place, Love Lane, Romsey, SO51 8DE

images.caption: Nick Clegg quoted for supporting real change in Britain.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes a survey asking residents for opinions on local issues and the performance of local services.
